name: Argomon
effect: ＜Digisorption -2＞ (When one of your Digimon digivolves into this card from your hand, you may suspend 1 of your Digimon to reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 2.)[When Digivolving] Suspend all of your opponent's Tamers.[All Turns] Your opponent's Tamers don't unsuspend.
